00020 #ifndef ALIGNMENTFACTORY_H_
00021 #define ALIGNMENTFACTORY_H_
00022 
00023 #include "Alignment.h"
00024 #include <vector>
00025 
00026 namespace Circal
00027   {
00028     class ScoringModel;
00029     class MatrixHelper;
00030     class Output;
00031     typedef std::vector< std::vector<double> > ScoreMatrix;
00032 
00033     class AlignmentFactory
00034       {
00035   protected:
00036 
00037       MatrixHelper* matrix;
00038       Output* prettyPrint;
00039 
00040       //Needleman Wunsch Alignment
00041       virtual void ForwardRecursionNMW(const bpp::Sequence* A,
00042           const bpp::Sequence* B, const ScoringModel* scoreM, ScoreMatrix* D);
00043       virtual Alignment BacktrackingNMW(const bpp::Sequence* outA,
00044           const bpp::Sequence* outB, const ScoringModel* scoreM,
00045           const ScoreMatrix* D, uint &i, uint &j);
00046 
00047       //Gotoh Alignment
00048       virtual void ForwardRecursionGotoh(const bpp::Sequence* A,
00049           const bpp::Sequence* B, const ScoringModel* scoreM, ScoreMatrix* D,
00050           ScoreMatrix* P, ScoreMatrix* Q);
00051       virtual Alignment BacktrackingGotohGlocal(const bpp::Sequence* outA,
00052           const bpp::Sequence* outB, const ScoringModel* scoreM,
00053           const ScoreMatrix* D, const ScoreMatrix* P, const ScoreMatrix* Q,
00054           uint &i, uint &j);
00055       virtual Alignment BacktrackingGotohGlobal(const bpp::Sequence* outA,
00056           const bpp::Sequence* outB, const ScoringModel* scoreM,
00057           const ScoreMatrix* D, const ScoreMatrix* P, const ScoreMatrix* Q,
00058           uint &i, uint &j);
00059 
00060       //Smith-Waterman Alignment
00061       virtual double ForwardRecursionSmithWaterman(const bpp::Sequence* A,
00062           const bpp::Sequence* B, const ScoringModel* scoreM, ScoreMatrix* D,
00063           uint &i, uint &j);
00064       virtual Alignment BacktrackingSmithWaterman(const bpp::Sequence* A,
00065           const bpp::Sequence* B, const ScoringModel* scoreM,
00066           const ScoreMatrix* D, uint &i, uint &j);
00067 
00068       //Smith-Waterman Alignment-Affin
00069       virtual double ForwardRecursionSmithWatermanAffin(const bpp::Sequence* A,
00070           const bpp::Sequence* B, const ScoringModel* scoreM, ScoreMatrix* D,
00071           ScoreMatrix* P, ScoreMatrix* Q, uint &bi, uint &bj);
00072       virtual Alignment BacktrackingSmithWatermanAffin(const bpp::Sequence* A,
00073           const bpp::Sequence* B, const ScoringModel* scoreM,
00074           const ScoreMatrix* D, const ScoreMatrix* P, const ScoreMatrix* Q,
00075           uint &i, uint &j);
00076 
00077   public:
00078       AlignmentFactory();
00079       virtual ~AlignmentFactory();
00080 
00081       virtual Alignment NeedlemanWunschAlignment(const bpp::Sequence* inA,
00082           const bpp::Sequence* inB, const ScoringModel* scoreM);
00083       virtual Alignment GotohAlignment(const bpp::Sequence* inA,
00084           const bpp::Sequence* inB, const ScoringModel* scoreM);
00085 
00086       virtual Alignment SmithWaterman(const bpp::Sequence* inA,
00087           const bpp::Sequence* inB, const ScoringModel* scoreM);
00088       virtual Alignment SmithWatermanAffin(const bpp::Sequence* inA,
00089           const bpp::Sequence* inB, const ScoringModel* scoreM);
00090             
00091       };
00092 
00093   }
